column4: I was trying to revive an old computer, and I get similar crashes when formatting the hard disks. I did some memtest86+, and I finally decided that RAM was the culprit
that could be the issue, because the errors occurred when I installed new RAM. I did run memtest though and it gave me no errors on this RAM.
I see. I'm sorry I couldn't help any further. That's the best I know so far.
